mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study ( study_no, email, study_name, study_hashtag, study_thumbnail, study_start_date, study_end_date, study_reg_date, current_member, max_member, selfstudy_rule, selfstudy_open_flag, selfstudy_password, groupstudy_info, groupstudy_plan, groupstudy_condition, recruitment_start_date, recruitment_end_date, study_end_flag, studyroom_grade, study_type, study_interest ) VALUES ( seq_study_no.NEXTVAL, #{studyMaker.email}, #{studyName}, #{studyHashtag:VARCHAR}, #{studyThumbnail:VARCHAR}, #{studyStartDate}, #{studyEndDate}, SYSDATE, 1, #{maxMamber:NUMERIC}, #{selfStudyRule:VARCHAR}, #{selfStudyOpenFlag:VARCHAR}, #{selfStudyPassword:VARCHAR}, #{groupStudyInfo:VARCHAR}, #{groupStudyPlan:VARCHAR}, #{groupStudyCondition:VARCHAR}, #{recruitmentStartDate:DATE}, #{recruitmentEndDate:DATE}, '1', #{studyRoomGrade}, #{studyType}, #{studyInterest} )
mapper.select: SELECT study_no, email, study_name, study_hashtag, study_thumbnail, current_member, max_member, groupstudy_info, groupstudy_plan, groupstudy_condition, recruitment_start_date, recruitment_end_date FROM study where study_no = #{value}

SELECT study_no, email, study_name, study_hashtag, study_thumbnail, recruitment_start_date, recruitment_end_date, current_member, max_member, studyroom_grade, study_interest FROM ( SELECT study_no, email, study_name, study_hashtag, study_thumbnail, recruitment_start_date, recruitment_end_date, current_member, max_member, studyroom_grade, study_interest, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT study_no, email, study_name, study_hashtag, study_thumbnail, recruitment_start_date, recruitment_end_date, current_member, max_member, study_interest, studyroom_grade FROM study
study_end_flag = '1' and study_type = 'group'
and study_interest = '독서'
and study_interest = '어학'
and study_interest = '임용'
and study_interest = '취업'
and study_interest = '공무원'
and study_interest = '자격증'
and study_interest = '자기계발'
and study_interest = '기타공부'
and study_name LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and study_hashtag LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY current_member ASC
ORDER BY current_member DESC
ORDER BY study_reg_date ASC
ORDER BY study_reg_date DESC
ORDER BY study_no
) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum}) outer_table WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
